verbose_text: S nitrosylation at Cys 597 by nitric oxide (NO) was reported to inhibit Hsp90alpha ATPase activity and may represent a negative-feedback loop reducing the activation of eNOS (endothelial nitric oxide synthase), which is Hsp90 dependent [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: NO) was reported to inhibit Hsp90alpha ATPase
